trans-unit.source: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter.
You're almost done. You should receive a confirmation mail within the next few minutes with instructions how to confirm your email.
trans-unit.target: Estamos casi listos. Recibirá un correo de confirmación en los próximos minutos con instrucciones de cómo confirmar tu correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter.
You should receive a confirmation mail within the next few minutes with link to confirm unsubscribe.
trans-unit.target: Estamos casi listos. Recibirá un correo de confirmación en los próximos minutos con instrucciones de cómo confirmar tu correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: You have been successfully unsubscribed from newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Ha dado de baja el boletín informativo.
Confirmación de la suscripción del boletín informativo.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm your email address by clicking on the following link:
trans-unit.target: Por favor confirme su dirección de correo electrónico haciendo clic en el siguiente enlace:

trans-unit.source: Should you wish to unsubscribe in the future, follow this link:
trans-unit.target: Si desea dar de baja su suscripción, por favor siga este enlace:

trans-unit.source: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter.
In order to unsubscribe please click the following link:
We were unable to find an active subscription
trans-unit.target: No hay ninguna suscripción para esta cuenta de Email.

trans-unit.source: Ajax page type setting is missing. Check if extension TypoScript is included.
A subscription with this email address already exists.
trans-unit.target: Ya existe una suscripción para esta cuenta de Email.

trans-unit.source: A subscription with this email address already exists, but waiting for confirmation. Please check your email box.
trans-unit.target: Ya existe una suscripción para esta cuenta de Email.

trans-unit.source: The subscription has already been confirmed.
Sorry, something went wrong. Please contact us.
trans-unit.target: Su identificación no se ha podido realizar. Por favor contáctenos

trans-unit.source: Invalid sender email. Check your typoscript settings
